CustomField.formula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Business_Type__c,"Partnership"),ISPICKVAL( Business_Type__c,"Private Company"),ISPICKVAL( Business_Type__c,"Trusts/Foundation"),ISPICKVAL( Business_Type__c,"Association/Club")), INCLUDES(Product__c,"VANs"), Active_BO_Count__c=0)
CustomField.label: Beneficial Owner Validation Error
